Title: Customer Chats: Sergio Passos from Blip at Microsoft Ignite 2024
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Join Rick Claus at Microsoft Ignite as he interviews Sergio Passos, Co-founder and CTO of Blip—a company revolutionizing customer connections through conversational interfaces. In this engaging conversation, discover how Blip leverages AI and Microsoft technologies to transform customer interactions across various messaging platforms.

Here’s what you’ll discover:

00:00 - Introduction to Sergio Passos and Blip 01:06 - Blip's journey from SMS to advanced messaging platforms 02:08 - The challenges of orchestrating AI-powered customer experiences 03:19 - Exploring multimodal aspects of conversational interfaces 04:06 - Blip's use of Microsoft solutions in their tech stack 05:01 - Advice on empowering product teams with data streams 06:00 - Sergio's upcoming panel at Microsoft Ignite and recent funding news

Sergio offers valuable insights on managing AI-powered conversations, leveraging multimodal interfaces, and the importance of data in driving innovation. This conversation provides a glimpse into the future of customer engagement, showcasing how AI and Microsoft technologies are revolutionizing business communications.

Speakers: Sergio Passos https://www.linkedin.com/in/scpassos Rick Claus https://www.linkedin.com/in/rickclaus/
